name: Chaos Research
tagline: Research is chaos, but IT shouldn't be!
body:
### Chaos
This GitHub Organization is focused on developing applications for basic biological science research.  It is primarily focused on meeting the needs of a specific research center, but is open to suggestions and/or contributions from others.

### Authors and Contributors
* David Spies (@dspies)

### Support or Contact
Please feel free to contact with any questions or suggestions.  The wiki will be updated in the future with a roadmap.  If you have problems, please file an issue in the appropriate [project](https://github.com/chaos-research) or better yet, file a pull request.
